data.fullContent: Yolanda was a very good cook. She had her own cooking show, and many viewers loved her recipes. When someone tried one of her recipes, it always turned out to be delicious. One day Yolanda decided to try something new. She decided to make a simple sandwich, but with a special sauce. The ingredients were simple; it was only mayonnaise, salt, and black pepper, but she thought it might taste good mixed together. When she tried it, she found that it did taste good! By accident she had created a new dish, and she knew she was about to become a famous chef.

q1.translation: 尤兰达是个很好的厨师。她有自己的烹饪节目，许多观众喜欢她的食谱。
q1.front: Yolanda was a very good cook. She had her own cooking show, and many viewers loved her recipes.
q1.content: Yolanda was a ____ good cook. She ____ her own cooking show, and many viewers ____ her recipes.

q2.translation: 尤兰达是个很好的厨师。她有自己的烹饪节目，许多观众喜欢她的食谱。当有人尝试她的食谱时，结果总是很美味。一天，尤兰达决定尝试一些新的东西。她决定做一个简单的三明治，但加了一种特殊的酱汁。配料很简单;里面只有蛋黄酱、盐和黑胡椒，但她觉得混合在一起会很好吃。当她尝了之后，她发现它确实很好吃!她偶然发明了一道新菜，她知道自己即将成为一名名厨。

The ingredients were simple; it was only mayonnaise, salt, and black pepper, but she thought it might taste good mixed together. When she tried it, she found that it did taste good! By accident she had created a new dish, and she knew she was about to become a famous chef.

She baked them anyway, and everyone said it was the worst dish ever.
When someone tried one of her recipes, it always turned out to be delicious.
